plannedViews.name: vw_ActiveUserPreferences
plannedViews.description: Shows preferences for active users only with denormalized user information
plannedViews.sql: SELECT u.UserId, u.Username, u.DisplayName, up.PreferenceKey, up.PreferenceValue, up.Category, up.LastUpdated FROM Users u INNER JOIN UserPreferences up ON u.UserId = up.UserId WHERE u.IsActive = TRUE
plannedViews.notes: Could improve performance for common queries joining users and preferences

plannedViews.name: vw_EnabledFeatureFlags
plannedViews.description: Shows only enabled feature flags with current environment filter
plannedViews.sql: SELECT FlagId, FlagName, Environment, RolloutPercentage, AppVersion, UpdatedAt FROM FeatureFlags WHERE IsEnabled = TRUE
plannedViews.notes: Simplifies queries that only need enabled flags
